mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.send_no AS "sendNo", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", sku.name AS "skuInfo.name", a.inv_id AS "invInfo.id", a.inv_old_num AS "invOldNum", inv.name AS "invInfo.name", sku.part_no AS "skuInfo.partNo", sku.item_no as "skuInfo.itemNo", a.order_id AS "bizOrderHeader.id", a.request_id AS "bizRequestHeader.id", a.order_num AS "orderNum", a.send_num AS "sendNum", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.cust_id AS "customer.id", a.logistics_id AS "bizLogistics.id", logs.name AS "bizLogistics.name", s.name AS "customer.name", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.value_price AS "valuePrice", a.operation AS "operation", a.freight AS "freight", a.carrier AS "carrier", a.settlement_status AS "settlementStatus", a.send_time AS "sendDate", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name AS "createBy.name", su.mobile AS "createBy.mobile"

LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info sku ON a.sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN biz_order_header orheader ON a.order_id = orheader.id LEFT JOIN sys_office s ON a.cust_id = s.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.id=a.create_id LEFT JOIN biz_request_header reheader ON a.order_id = reheader.id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info inv ON inv.id = a.inv_id LEFT JOIN sys_office cent ON cent.id = inv.cust_id LEFT JOIN biz_logistics logs ON logs.id = a.logistics_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_send_goods_record a
WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY updateDate DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_send_goods_record( id, send_no,
sku_id,
inv_id,
inv_old_num,
order_id,
request_id,
order_num,
send_num,
biz_status, cust_id,
logistics_id,
img_url,
value_price,
operation,
freight,
carrier,
settlement_status,
send_time, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sendNo},
#{skuInfo.id},
#{invInfo.id},
#{invOldNum},
#{bizOrderHeader.id},
#{bizRequestHeader.id},
#{orderNum},
#{sendNum},
#{bizStatus}, #{customer.id},
#{bizLogistics.id},
#{imgUrl},
#{valuePrice},
#{operation},
#{freight},
#{carrier},
#{settlementStatus},
#{sendDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_send_goods_record SET sku_id = #{skuInfo.id},
inv_id = #{invInfo.id},
a.inv_old_num = #{invOldNum},
order_id = #{bizOrderHeader.id},
request_id = #{bizRequestHeader.id},
order_num = #{orderNum}, send_num = #{sendNum}, biz_status = #{bizStatus}, cust_id = #{customer.id},
logistics_id = #{bizLogistics.id},
img_url = #{imgUrl},
value_price = #{valuePrice},
operation = #{operation},
freight = #{freight},
carrier = #{carrier},
settlement_status = #{settlementStatus},
send_time = #{sendDate}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(a.send_num) FROM biz_send_goods_record a LEFT JOIN biz_order_detail od ON od.order_id = a.order_id AND od.sku_id = a.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_order_request bior ON bior.order_detail_id = od.id WHERE bior.request_detail_id = #{reqDetailId} AND a.create_time BETWEEN #{oneDayBefore} AND #{yesterdayEnd}
